Detailed Description

This class is used to access database (via special daemon).

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum cdbdaemon::cmd
 

Commands send to daemon.

Enumeration values:
cmd_edu_ls  get education levels
cmd_work_ls  get works
cmd_int_ls  get hobbies
cmd_area_ls  list areaas
cmd_sex_ls  list sexes
cmd_dom_ls  list domains
cmd_ui_add  add informations about user
cmd_ui_rm  remove informations about user
cmd_dom_get  get domain
cmd_dom_get_by_name  get domain by name
cmd_ui_get_by_name  get info. by name

References cdbdaemon::user_info::area_id, cdbdaemon::user_info::birthday, cdbdaemon::user_info::city, cdbdaemon::user_info::country, cdbdaemon::user_info::edu_id, err_no, err_read, err_write, cdbdaemon::user_info::id, cdbdaemon::user_info::ints_id, cdbdaemon::user_info::re_ans, cdbdaemon::user_info::re_que, cdbdaemon::user_info::sex_id, and cdbdaemon::user_info::work_id.

uint8_t cdbdaemon::ui_cmp_by_name (  const user_info &  ui  ) 
 

compares user information with copy stored in database

Compares given user's information with one stored in database, compared are (cs - case sensitive, ci - case insesitive): locale (cs), country (ci), city (ci), re_ans (ci), birthday, area_id, work_id, edu_id, sex_id

Returns:
err_no - match, err_empty - no match, ... - error
